languages.text: "Выходит, думают все-таки там, наверху о нас, нижнепалубных..."
"Turns out upstairs hasn't forgotten us lower-deckers after all..."
languages.original_text: "Выходит, думают все-таки там, наверху о нас, нижнепалубных..."

traits.locale_text: "Turns out upstairs hasn't forgotten us lower deckers after all..."
"Turns out upstairs hasn't forgotten us lower deckers after all..."
"Turns out upstairs hasn't forgotten us lower deckers after all..."
"Turns out upstairs hasn't forgotten us lower deckers after all..."

languages.text: “看来，上面那些人并没有忘记我们这些底层人……”
languages.original_text: "Turns out upstairs hasn't forgotten us lower-deckers after all..."

traits.locale_text: “看来，上面那些人并没有忘记我们这些底层人……”

languages.text: «Parece que los de arriba no se han olvidado de las cubiertas inferiores...».
languages.original_text: "Turns out upstairs hasn't forgotten us lower-deckers after all..."

traits.locale_text: «Parece que los de arriba no se han olvidado de las cubiertas inferiores...».

languages.text: 「やはり、上層は俺達下層のことを忘れていなかった…」
languages.original_text: "Turns out upstairs hasn't forgotten us lower-deckers after all..."

traits.locale_text: 「やはり、上層は俺達下層のことを忘れていなかった…」

languages.text: "Die oben haben uns Unterdecker wohl doch nicht vergessen ..."
languages.original_text: "Turns out upstairs hasn't forgotten us lower-deckers after all..."

traits.locale_text: "Die oben haben uns Unterdecker wohl doch nicht vergessen ..."

languages.text: « En fin de compte, les gens de la haute nous ont pas oubliés, on dirait... »
languages.original_text: "Turns out upstairs hasn't forgotten us lower-deckers after all..."
